meanings.sent1: The bondmaids worked hard in the fields all day.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy family had several bondmaids to help with household chores.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog chased the bondmaids around the garden.
meanings.sent4: The bondmaids were like shadows, always present but never truly seen.
meanings.sent5: The bondmaids wore simple clothing and toiled under the hot sun.

meanings.definition: Women who are bound to serve another.
meanings.sent1: The bondmaids were loyal to their mistress and followed her every command.
meanings.sent2: In ancient times, bondmaids were a common sight in noble households.
meanings.sent3: The bondmaids jokingly plotted to switch roles with their mistress for a day.
meanings.sent4: The bondmaids' fate was intertwined with that of their mistress, like two sides of the same coin.
meanings.sent5: The bondmaids' dedication to their duties was unwavering and admirable.
